description:
cmd/go: fix build on windows.

ImportPath should be escaped if using as relative.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlecode.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
http://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Thanks for this, but there are deeper problems that need
to be solved too, surrounding relative imports.  Fixing those
will take care of these too.

Russ

subject: code review 5723044: cmd/go: fix build on windows.
